meanings.sent1: She retracted her hand quickly from the hot stove.
meanings.sent2: The turtle retracted its head into its shell for protection.
meanings.sent3: The magician retracted the scarf, but it had disappeared completely!

meanings.sent5: The curtains retracted smoothly, revealing a breathtaking view.

meanings.sent1: He retracted his statement after realizing it was incorrect.

meanings.sent5: She retracted her promise, unable to fulfill it.
